
    SELECT 
        p.Id AS [AnswerId],
        p.ParentId AS [QuestionId],
        p.CreationDate AS [AnswerCreationDate],
        p.Score AS [AnswerScore],
        p.Body AS [AnswerBody],
        p.OwnerUserId AS [AnswerAuthorId],
        p.OwnerDisplayName AS [AnswerAuthorName]
    FROM 
        Posts p
    WHERE 
        p.PostTypeId = 2  -- Answer posts
        AND p.ParentId IN (57503578,57639507,57889719,58630097,58933795,58975112,59236611,59240304,59474920,59566458,59759353,60176044,60303168,60349533,60380374,60521929,60768178,61048334,61096521,61188927,61268184,61289322,61919141,62087265,62547923,62784756,62908594,63012327,63050024,63226588,63288356,63569560,63672189,63676119,63691962,63803136,63952543,64272276,64930068,65345432,65353108,65357083,65820392,65828544,65882254,65893608,65925430,66335124,66358482,66438446,66877085,66918575,69646986,70130613,70230123,70278241,70332762,70386041,70478320,70556460,70610678,70619765,70623275,71030111,71525489,71741116,71885354,72017244,72038527,72437988,72478547,72646802,72994320,73018888,73128465,73143492,73178417,73255602,73319566,73327325,73394214,73497316,73626276,73798925,73853178,73951328,74112918,74114983,74151972,74416617,74572309,74601050,74775432,74801012,74869907,74887938,74927029,74973574,75063703,75162480,75268325,75322937,75386396,75399577,75447011,75478713,75489109,75559868,75607496,75620346,75720649,75750113,75812749,75839566,75884083,75991359,75996853,76183721,76202754,76209563,76235374,76259462,76262960,76266314,76279262,76303782,76322053,76484161,76512235,76620272,76705251,76708129,76708448,76734107,76738799,76739418,76746551,76749213,76751156,76899809,76924487,76937222,76938952,76969053,76971088,76976570,77007269,77077222,77099483,77101038,77109635,77237797,77268763,77308573)
    ORDER BY 
        p.ParentId, p.CreationDate;
